my people/my nation. In a narrow sense this phrase refers to the people of Israel. In a broader sense, it is all those who come to the true God.

give ear. Listen.

law. "The Lord is our lawgiver" (33:22). "I will give thee tables of stone, and a law, and commandments which I have written," the Lord said to Moses (Ex. 24:12).

judgment/light. The Lord's judgment (or justice) is a light in that it is steady, reliable, and true. In addition, the Lord himself is a light for the people (42:4; Luke 2:30-32; Acts 26:23), as are his disciples (3 Ne. 15:12). In D&C 45:9 the Lord says further that his "everlasting covenant" is also "a light to the world."
